title: B1 Mercenary Support Main - Looking for ADC
body:
B1 Support main, I play and own_** every single support and play style to confidence**_, you can be the shot-caller, if you want me to do it, I can. I own Discord, Team-Speak and Skype or if your anxious or nervous to speak, typing and pings I can do too. I play pretty much daily and play almost exclusively ranked Solo and Flex. Looking to climb as high as I can so if you don't feel like you can climb higher, I wish you luck...but I will look for someone else who does.

Mains in order of preference but _**CAN**_ play all {{champion:432}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:117}}{{champion:497}} {{champion:267}}

replies.body: Hi,I'm S5 and have been looking for someone like you for ages,added you on my friends list.Looking forward to some duo with you mate.
added ya on my friends list already just hit me up when your on and we can duo
